x-apidog-enum.description: Balance reservation operation, moving the amount to the on_hold balance.

x-apidog-enum.name: Release Operation
x-apidog-enum.description: Release operation of the reserved balance, returning it to the available balance

assetCode.description: The code of the asset used in the operation.

chartOfAccounts.description: The name of the Chart-of-Accounts that the operation belongs to.

amount.description: An object containing information about the amount used in the operation.

balance.description: An object containing information about the balance before the operation.

balanceAfter.description: An object containing information about the balance after the operation.

accountId.description: The unique identifier of the Account.

accountAlias.description: The alias for the account used in the operation.

balanceId.description: The unique identifier of the Balance.

route.description: Unique identifier of the operation route assigned to this specific leg of the transaction. This must match the corresponding source and destination configuration, determining how value is moved between accounts within the transaction route.

balanceAffected.description: Indicates whether the operation had an impact on the account balance.

balanceKey.description: The key identifier of the Balance

id.description: ID

asset.description: The code that identifies the asset that will be sent.

value.description: The amount that will be sent

from.description: The list of accounts that will be used as source. (DEBIT operations)

source.description: The list of accounts that will be used as source.

to.description: A list of the accounts to which the amount will be transferred.

distribute.description: An object containing the information of the account to which the amount will be transferred.

send.description: An object containing information about the transaction that will be sent.

pending.description: Indicates whether a transaction will be executed in two phases, leaving it in a pending state.

route.description: Unique identifier of the transaction route configuration. It defines the overall flow of the transaction, including the structure of the operations to be executed.
